title: (36812) Redondela - 1 Camiño Condesa de Torrecedeira
description: Drinking water tap only to fill bottles

title: (36812) Redondela - 81 N-555
description: It is a camper friendly restaurant. We already came here a year ago and they let us spend the night at their farm after dinner and the next day they very kindly refilled our water tank.

title: (36693) Redondela - 38 Avenida Mendiño
description: Large parking area 10 minutes from the center on foot. Sandy soil and with some unevenness. Perfect to spend the day in Rondela.

title: (36800) Redondela - N-550
description: Services for motorhomes at the Repsol de Redondela service station on the N-550 road towards Pontevedra or towards Vigo. There are services in both directions of traffic. They have a food store, baked bread, AdBlue and butane bottles.

title: (36812) Redondela - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place to spend the night outside of the city, has tables to spend the day too. We only spend the night and no noise, we recommend it! (06/21/19)

title: (36818) Redondela - 35 Estrada a Pazos de Borbén
title_short: (36818) Redondela - 35 Estrada a Pazos de Borbén
description: Free parking in the municipality of Redondela. Very calm and quiet, ideal to spend the night after having dinner in one of the "furanchos" in the area. Highly recommended in particular the one in O Tarrastal, 300 meters away.

title: (36812) Redondela - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet and great views. Directions via dust roads.

title: (36812) Redondela - 2 Camiño Praia de Rande
description: Picnic table area next to the estuary. Good parking. Narrow access only for vans.

title: (36693) Redondela - 44 Paseo Da Praia
description: public parking right on the beach and the kitespot. Very good public toilets and showers on the beach. Camping forbidden. Small vehicles only

name: Camping Cesantes
title: (36693) Camping Cesantes
description: Camping Cesantes

title: (36693) Pontevedra - 12 Camiño Campos da Ribeira
description: Large field. Even when the public car parks by the beach are crowded, there is plenty of room for dozens of motorhomes. In addition, it is possible to stay the night like most occupants of the parking. The parking has direct access to the beach and children's games. No service on site, but a shower and a toilet on the beach.

title: (36693) Redondela - 40 Paseo da Praia
description: Parking lot on the roadside, no problem with our 6.5 meter long van. Very clean public toilet and beach showers. Picnic benches are also available. We stood here for one night, very quiet and no problems.

title: (36142) Vilaboa - 9 N-554
description: View of the oyster banquette of Vigo. Sandy beach for swimming. The street nearby is audible with a little noise! Stay overnight without problems! Slight slope unless you right on the front.

title: (36693) Redondela - 33 Paseo da Praia
description: Public parking next to the beach, very correct toilets and showers on the beach. Very calm.

title: (36142) Santradán - N-554
description: Ground parking attached to the road with sea views. Some unevenness and noise from cars but it can be a good option to stop for lunch or go to spend the day at the beach that is a few meters away.

title: (36693) Cesantes - 18 Paseo da Praia
description: Dead-end well lit road along back of the beach.  Level parking spots.  We just fit our 6m van.  Two or three bars along the beach and a great bakery just up the hill.  Super views across the ria.  Can be windy and is a popular spot for kite surf.  Awesome playground.

title: (36317) Vigo - Camiño Monte Vixiados
description: Vixiador forest park. wooded area with barbecues, stone tables and benches, children's play area, fountains and a bar next to it. hiking and mountain biking trails

title: (36957) Moaña - Corredor do Morrazo
description: Next to the Castro de Montealegre with views of the estuary. It is a large esplanade of land with a little incline although there are some places where it is almost flat. there is a water source nearby, down the road, and several viewpoints that can be reached on foot. a place with beautiful views and to spend the night well.

title: (36415) Redondela - 25 chan das pipas
description: Picnic area near a bar. There are several good areas to park the motorhome. The place is quiet at night. There are different routes

title: (36142) Vilaboa - 20 N-554
description: rest area equipped with tables and a small beach for swimming, near the N554. Not suitable for spending the night, very inclined, without toilet services, litter bins, garbage containers, showers...

title: (36815) Redondela - 3 Camino Igrexa de Vilar
description: Parking next to Igrexia de San Martino (and its cemetery), from where you can access the water path, and visit the ruins of a mill. Fairly flat site with room for several ACs.

title: (36957) Moaña - 61 Lugar Verdeal
description: Quiet area even for overnight

title: (36320) Chapela - 60 Rúa San Telmo
description: Beautiful little parking lot near the sports centre with cafes restaurants play area, beach for swimming and separate beach especially for dogs very close. Free of charge and possible to stay overnight.

title: (36810) Redondela - 25 Escalinata do Meixoeiro
description: Small clearing where you can park up to three vehicles comfortably. Very quiet and surrounded by nature, on the night we spent we only saw a few people hiking. Access is through a track but any van will have no problem with it, even high volume.

title: (36957) Moaña - 73 PO-551
description: Nice parking along the Ria de Vigo. Nice view of a suspended viaduct. Small beach nearby where you can swim.

title: () - Domaio,
description: Location in Vigo right at the foot of the Vigo estuary with spectacular views and a super quiet location with a cove beach next to it and grass a bit unprotected from the wind for that reason but fine. Overnight prohibited.

title: (36810) Redondela - 13 Camiño de Saramagoso
description: Near some petroglyphs and with the possibility of making routes through the mountain.

title: (36957) Moaña - Estrada Cangas-Vilaboa, 114
description: Perfect place to stop for lunch and enjoy the best views of the Vigo and Rande bridge. Bakeries, bars, pharmacy, supermarket and dispensary.

title: (36142) Vilaboa - 8 Lugar Nores
description: Gas station with shower. Small but clean.

title: (36142) Vilaboa - 30B Lugar Pazos
description: Perfect water source to recharge

title: (36142) Vilaboa - 1 Lugar Costal
description: Good place to stop or spend the night. Flat, with picnic tables, dumpster and store next to it.

title: (36810) Redondela - 24 Camiño o Castro
description: It is a paved car park at the foot of Monte da Peneda, a lookout mountain with a small chapel where you can contemplate the Ría de Vigo and San Simón cove. The uphill road is paved but narrow.

name: Restaurante Luis
title: (36142) Restaurante Luis
description: We called this restaurant to see if we could park our motorhome. Upon arrival, the manager or owner was waiting for us with a place reserved for our 7.10mts. It is also a restaurant that is eaten by vice! Highly recommended. Call before you go.

title: (36317) Vigo - 3F Subida á Madroa
description: Zoo parking lot, quiet with picnic tables, small kiosk café and beautiful viewpoint over the Ría de Vigo.

title: (36142) Vilaboa - 17 Rua Barciela
description: Place with free water, accessible from local road, not from autostrada. Not for sleep.

title: (36955) Moaña - 323 Camiño á Costa do Latón
title_short: (36955) Moaña - 323 Camiño á Costa do Latón
description: Ground parking in front of the refreshment bar and the beach. There is no ban, but the site is next to a shipyard and the parking lot is a bit dirty.

title: (36690) Soutomaior - N-550
description: Car park with service area for all waters. Park close by and small beach beyond. Also, beach has toilets. Shops 10 min walk away.

title: (36691) Sotomayor - EP-2908
description: Free ground parking ideal for visiting the castle.

title: (36690) Sotomayor - 45 N-550
description: Self-service laundry

title: (36207) Vigo - Avd de la Marina Española 1
title_short: (36207) Vigo - Avd de la Marina Española 1
description: Parking for motorhomes, (maximum 24 hours) Winter hours from 9:30 a.m. to 8 p.m. Summer hours from 9 a.m. to 10 p.m. Water service (ONLY FOR CUSTOMERS). 2.5km from the center. Bus stop 50m away, and health center, pharmacy and 5 different supermarkets 200m away. Entrance to the highway and small beach 300 m away. Entry can be personal or assisted (call to enter). Check-in when entering, check-out when leaving. THERE ARE NO BATHROOMS.

title: (36207) Vigo - 39 Travesía Espiñeiro 1
description: Free parking open 24 hours. Spectacular view. There are several water sources to load with drums. There are no drains. I do not know if you can spend the night or not, I do not care about spending a few days. There is a beach

title: (36691) Soutomaior - EP- 2908
description: There is a car park for any vehicle, the other dirt park is further away and difficult to enter, you could get the car buried in the gravel.

title: (36207) Vigo - 131 Rúa Campana
description: Self-service laundry from 8:00 a.m. to 11:00 p.m. 365 days a year. Avenida Sanjurjo Badía num. 181

title: (36214) Vigo - 41H Rúa Barreiro
description: Mixed municipal parking without restrictions, shaded during the day, all shops nearby.

title: (36206) Vigo - 217 Camino Gonderan
description: Gonderan Street. 100 meters down the pedestrian street is C. Comercial Travesía, (Carrefour). Ideal for spending the night on the weekend since there is a school during the week. Water source 150 meters, beaches 15 minutes, Path "Ruta del Agua" 200 meters. Bakeries, laundries, gas stations in the area.

title: (36690) Pontevedra - 3B Lugar Xunqueira
description: Beautiful site next to the river, dirt and asphalt parking, river beach showers, beach bar, public toilets (I think only open during the day).

title: (36955) Moaña - 188 Estrada da Guia
description: Flat esplanade accessible by a dead end road, located in the upper part of an old quarry (be careful with children). Excellent views of the estuary. Playground glued. Supermarket and a couple of bars/restaurants about 200m. Beach with shower in the lower part of the quarry that goes down a small path that goes down the side of the quarry next to the houses. We have not slept but there is no indication that prohibits it and it looks like a quiet place.

title: (36141) - 26A Rua Paredes
description: Quiet area to spend the night next to a small beach and some marshes. There is a whole path that goes through the San Simon salt flats. we had a good night. There is also the official parking lot of Las Salinas but it has more people

title: (36141) Vilaboa - 32 Lugar Paredes
description: Gas station with free public toilet, they are clean since they are also the cafeteria toilets. There is a shop and cafe.

title: (36318) Vigo - 183 Rúa da Becerreira
description: Quiet natural park throughout the day where you can rest safely, in summer it is cool because the trees give a lot of shade. It has no services but there is a gas station a few meters away with a cafeteria (closed on weekends) and bathrooms.

title: (36957) Moaña - CF-402
description: Viewpoint parking. flat dirt terrain.

title: (36207) Vigo - 16 Avenida Guixar
description: Ideal parking to leave the AC and visit the center of Vigo. Close to the train track but at night they do not circulate. Old town at 2 kms.

title: (36691) Comboa - 25A Rua Comboa
description: Some places to park near the somatre river ... Beach bar and restaurants in the city 10 min. Good atmosphere

title: () Moaña - 63 Avenida Porta do Sol
description: Parking along the road. Quiet for one night.No ban.Resto playground.Promateurs, dogs and sportsmen nearby. A lot of passage during the day but quite quiet at night.

title: (36955) Moaña - 5 Paseo de la Capilla de San Bartolome
title_short: (36955) Moaña - 5 Paseo de la Capilla de San Bartolome
description: Embankment of parking with playground, beach and marsh next. Tapas area. There is another motorhome

address.street: 5 Paseo de la Capilla de San Bartolome

title: (36415) Mos -
description: Public parking gravel, flat and large. near the museum. we spent the night visiting a peregrino . the bar is very good, O Alpendre cheap prices. many motorhomes enter, but I think 10 would be a number that does not bother

title: (36205) Vigo - 14 Avenida de Emilio Martínez Garrido
title_short: (36205) Vigo - 14 Avenida de Emilio Martínez Garrido
description: Lacolada Martínez Garrido self-service laundry. It has 3 washing machines and 2 dryers, as well as a machine for changing banknotes to coins. Next to a square and cafeteria.

title: (36914) Miñán - Unnamed Road
description: Water point next to a ranch. flows continuously. No faucet.

title: (36914) Miñán -
description: Place with spectacular views of the Ría de Vigo. The road in poor condition, but you get there

title: (36914) Miñán -
description: Very quiet place surrounded by nature. The nearby site is a mountain bike course with circuit, ramp etc... Super spot for mountain bike enthusiasts! Next to it there are tables, garbage cans and a water point. Locals come here.

title: (36959) Moaña - 9 Avenida Porta do Sol
description: Quiet and spacious, near the town and the beach attached to an exclusive park for dogs which has a fountain.

title: (36416) Tameiga - Avenida do Rebullón 23
description: ACCESS From the AP-9, take exit 159 if you are coming from Bayona, or 159-B and then the 8 Puxeiros if you are coming from Peinador, continue and once at the Alto de Puxeiros roundabout turn right west towards Rebullón and continue to As Center Pedriñas, where the area is located. If you are on the N-120, take exit 8 if coming from Vigo, or 9 if coming from Porriño, to the Alto de Puxeiros roundabout. COMMENTS Maximum stay of 72 hours. INTERESTING Privileged setting with swimming pool, cafeteria with daily menu, sports fields and barbecues. Forest park nearby. A petrol station is 2 km away. Bus stop for Vigo at 1km. All services in the urban area, about 400 m. Hiking routes, viewpoints towards Vigo and towards the Louriña Valley.

title: (36313) O Pouso - Av. do Rebullón
description: Well-leveled dirt parking next to a recreational area with tables and barbecue. There is a bar, garbage cans and swings. There are streetlights where the tables are. The water fountains do not work as of August 25, 2023. A little noisy due to the highway that passes relatively nearby.

title: (36416) - s/n Avenida do Rebullón
description: Bembrive Forest Park. Area with tables, barbecues and children's play area. Views of the Cíes Islands. Very quiet place. Sandwich bar on site.

title: (36416) - 23 Avenida do Rebullón
description: Tameiga Park Parking. With picnic tables and barbecues, next to the Bembrive picnic area and a motorhome area that also has a toilet.

title: (36142) Vilaboa / Marín - Unnamed Road
description: Small corner roadside very quiet. Tall trees for the shade. In the direction of the viewpoint (barely higher). A beautiful view at sunset

title: (36204) Vigo - 3 Travesía Couto San Honorato 1
description: parking

title: (36959) Moaña - PO-1102
description: Viewpoint, you can see the Vigo estuary, beautiful views, it has a lawn, benches and a fountain.

title: (36202) Vigo - 6 Rúa Cánovas del Castillo
description: Blue paid parking area, in front of the docks. Perfect for parking and taking a walk around the city. About 600 meters away is the Peitieiros bar where they make a daily menu with traditional and homemade dishes.

title: (36203) Vigo - 2 Paseo Rosalía de Castro
description: Parking in Castelo Do Castro 20 minutes from downtown on foot. There are some paid baths or a bar near the parking lot, at night it is a quiet place with a shade more than half a day.

title: (36141) Vilaboa - 1 EP-0103
description: Good park to spend the day and night, there are picnic tables, a large lake and it is ideal to go with children, it also has a playground. There is also a bar and several beach bars. For the upper area you can go to the Cotorredondo viewpoint, where there is a spectacular view of the Ría de Vigo and part of the Ría de Pontevedra. Quite noisy at night, roadside. There is a high corner on a quieter plateau a little behind at 100m.

title: (36313) Vigo - Camiño Área do Lecer
description: Pouso forest park. area with tables, barbecues, fountain, playground, hiking trails and mountain biking. very calm.

title: (36415) - Estrada Porriño Redondela
description: Gas station. Draining gray and black water is free (ideal for refueling)

title: (36313) Vigo - 33A Rúa dos Chans
description: Nice picnic area, many tables and benches to choose from, sun or shade, and we will spend the night here

title: (36202) Vigo - 53 Avenida da Beiramar
description: It is a parking lot of a gas station. It is near the Center. You can go on foot.

name: Camping Tirán
title: (36958) Camping Tirán
description: Camping Tiran in Moaña

title: (36210) Vigo - 31 Camino Pastora Zona Residenci
description: Parking lot, overnight allowed, deliver to the park guard, quiet during the night. Nearby restaurants and cafes.

title: (36313) Vigo - 339 Estrada de Bembrive
description: Parking to start a route

title: (36202) Vigo - 24 Rúa de Jacinto Benavente
description: Little busy street with flat parking lots at night and a 15 minute walk to get to the Cies Islands ferry terminal. At night there were some people who were a bit insecure but the truth is that in the end without problems, well a truck entering the warehouses. Luckily we arrived at night because in the early morning everything was full

title: (36938) A Fonte Alta - Unnamed Road
description: Large picnic area with garbage and plenty of space to park and eat, I suppose you can sleep. There are paths to go for a walk. Chans viewpoint nearby.

title: (36202) Vigo - 61 Rúa de Jacinto Benavente
description: Free parking next to a polygon, 20 minutes walk from a shopping center. We have spent the night with a Camper van, very well, only noise from passing cars, since it is at the entrance of a polygon. There is a Repsol nearby and a Lidl a 4-minute walk away. If you come to Vigo, after several options in this app, this site seemed the best.

title: (36954) Cangas - Camiño do Monte da Pena
title_short: (36954) Cangas - Camiño do Monte da Pena
description: Recreation area with tables and benches, nice views

title: (36213) Vigo - Rúa do Prado Vello
description: Estacionamiento El Museo Quiñones de León, sin estacionamiento, sombreado, tranquilo y cercano es un parque y el río. no acampamos, pero el tiempo que estuvimos allí fue muy tranquilo. Pueden ser ciertos días hay más movimientos debido a la presencia del Museo.

title: (36826) - 18 Lugar Insua
description: Recreational area "Carreira Ancha". A very quiet place, with a picnic area and shade. Good views. Drinking water.

title: (36210) Vigo - 24D Camiño Espedrigada
description: Large free parking, very well connected, quiet, safe and flat, without services but recommended to visit the city, is accessed by paved area between two-story house and large building although it is land is flat and there is no height or length limit

title: (36938) Igrexario - 11 Lugar Igresario
description: Parking with beautiful views of the sea from in front of the Church of Santa María de Cela and the Restaurant Iglesario, where you can enjoy the cuisine of the area.

title: (36895) - 17 Rua Chans
description: Private enclosed level property. Completely gated so pets cannot escape the property.

title: (36947) Cangas - 23 Rúa da Garita
description: Free parking next to the beach

title: (36400) O Porriño - Unnamed Road
description: Two very quiet areas to spend the night both during the day and at night the area below where the large esplanade is at night can be more busy, we stayed in the upper one and all night without noise, a fairly safe place

title: (36208) Vigo - 498 Travesía de Bouzas Portuario
description: Parking area within walking distance of downtown Vigo. There are always free spaces. On Sunday mornings there is a fair and it is full of cars and vans.

title: (36827) Ponte Caldelas - 1 Lugar Chan do Casal
title_short: (36827) Ponte Caldelas - 1 Lugar Chan do Casal
description: Picnic area with an open rural pool. The water is from the spring that makes the pool. You have to pass the cemetery

title: (36208) Vigo - 55 Rúa de Eduardo Cabello
description: Parking lot next to a sports complex and a small beach. Central and calm. No opportunities for supply and disposal. Gas station 100 meters from the hotel.

title: (36715) Tui - 9 Rúa Loureiro
description: Beade Forest Park. tables, barbecues, fountains, playground for children, views of the estuary, bar-restaurant, hiking trails. Very calm

title: (36938) Bueu - 65 PO-551
description: Gas station with RV wash available

title: (36947) Cangas - 1 Rúa Aldea de Arriba
description: wash 10Kg of laundry in 29' and dry in 16' near a car park and the beach.v

title: (36210) Vigo - 17 Rúa Ponte da Veiga
description: Parking in a quiet area with two supermarkets opposite lidle and Mercadona also has laundry in front. tables and fountain nearby in the park there is no toilet

title: (36912) Marín - 46B Poblado Casas
description: Free parking on land. Day Night. No services of any kind. Beware large motorhomes! I would not advise it, access is through narrow roads and its entrance is also narrow. Near the beach.

title: (36912) Marín - 2 Poblado Casas
description: Drinking water source

title: (36400) Porriño - 16 Avenida Buenos Aires
description: New self-service laundry and dryer. Wifi with a good connection.

title: (36158) Pontevedra - A Fracha
description: Picnic area A Fracha. Newly renovated. Untreated spring water. Hiking and mountain biking routes. You can continue up to 2 other viewpoints along a dirt track.

title: (36866) Ponteareas - 29 Barranco Freixa
description: Quiet place at night next to the Tea river, 2 km from the city on foot. There is a several kilometer river path, well marked and signposted, with plenty of shade and very pleasant to walk. There are stone tables and public sports fields right next to it.

title: (36915) Marín - 26C Rua Arealonga
description: Area with tables, shade and easy access from the ring road.

title: (36947) Cangas - 16 Lugar Reboredo
description: Exclusive marked parking for motorhomes. More or less 10 places. It lacks services although there is a garbage container in the vicinity. It is a high point above Cangas and you can see the Ria de Vigo a bit. Next to a supermarket. Five minutes walk to the old town of Cangas.

title: (36866) Ponteareas - 56 Barranco Freixa
description: Freixa river beach. Very busy in the summer during the day, very quiet at night. In summer there are beach bars during the day and even in recent years lifeguards on the river beach. You can park without problems all year round. Please respect the environment and do not litter, water or camp. A fountain crosses the dam, as well as a recreation area and sports fields. Also a very pleasant riverside path to walk. The town is 2 km away. There is a supermarket just over 1 km away.

title: (36940) Cangas - Rúa Gondomar
description: Parking without service.

title: (36208) Vigo - 62 Camiño Igrexa
description: Free parking, a bit 'on the slope, without services. Near the sea, and a small park. Quiet night.

title: (36208) Vigo - 4 Camiño Igrexa
description: Very quiet parking, near the beaches and very close to the city of Vigo.Only overnight, has no water services. Bus stop attached to the parking.

title: (36939) Bueu - 54 Estrada Agrelo
description: Paid parking although there is no barrier and does not put anything at the entrance . 1 minute from the beach. Very quiet area, with the possibility of shade (watch out for low branches), very level grassy ground. There are no showers, services in the beach bars and public next to the lifeguard. Suitable for any vehicle.

title: (36400) O Porriño - Calle Tras dos Fornos
title_short: (36400) O Porriño - Calle Tras dos Fornos
description:
Porriño does not have much to visit. Large plot of land, 5 minutes from downtown walking.
crossing the train track through the tunnel there is a path along the Louro river. Many places to eat, we ate at Bar Celtiña less than 500m. On Tuesday you have to be careful there is a street market and the townspeople fill the parking lot (it's morning).
On July 11 and the last two of September are local parties and this parking is used to put the odds and ends.

title: (36915) Marín - 51 Urbanizacion Virgen del Carmen
description: Quiet place with shade, neighbors come to walk dogs and there are houses around it, but it is a quiet area

title: (36940) Cangas - PK 15 PO-551
description: Cepsa gas station, with a tap to fill the water tank.

title: (36890) Mondariz-Balneario - 14 Avenida Enrique Peinador Vela
description: Small parking lot by the river, with sports equipment, perfect for picnics, overnight stay possible, no service.

title: (36212) Vigo - 101 Rúa San Paio
description: Large free parking area. You can stay overnight. Nearby, there are cafes, restaurants, pharmacies, banks, Amazon hub lockers, urban transport lines, etc.

title: (36940) Cangas - 20 PO-551
description: Free parking right at the pier where ferries leave for Cies Islands, Ons ... Quiet place to spend the night in the town, downtown 5 minutes on foot. Parking spaces for campers no larger than an L3 (approximately 5.90m)

title: (36208) Vigo - 3 Camiño Borralleiro
description: Harritxindorrez park, literally 10 steps from the beach. It has bars and snack bars next to it. Generally quiet but there may be more people. It is very big and can fit many cars.

title: (36940) Cangas - 6 Rúa de Xosé Alexandre Cribeiro
title_short: (36940) Cangas - 6 Rúa de Xosé Alexandre Cribeiro
description: Free public parking to park if you go to the port of Cangas for an excursion to the Cíes Islands. No services. Spacious and land. In front of a supermarket and 6 minutes walk from the port.

title: (36875) Mondariz - 5 PO-252
description: Service area for motorhomes. It has a black and gray water drain, full of clean water and containers. Large parking. Area next to the fluvial beach "Fuente del Val", Mondariz (next to the spa Mondariz). On the river beach you will find a basketball court, a five-a-side football pitch, tennis courts, barbecues and a bar. Village Mondariz and Mondariz Spa within 2 km.

title: (36949) Cangas - Rúa Arrecife
description:
It is a car park on a breakwater. The sea views are beautiful. It is situated in a spruced up and modernized industrial zone.

They have created an incredible space for pets, a very nice promenade full of puppies, and several beaches for puppies.

He sleeps super quiet. We slept three nights and everything was perfect.

title: (36949) Cangas - Sa Roque do Monte
description: A car park at the top of Cangas. there is plenty of space and it has incredible views of the Vigo estuary. There is a fountain and containers for garbage.

title: (36410) O Porriño - 2 Rúa B
description: Area with easy parking. It has a self-service laundry with special washing machines for washing pets, a supermarket, a bakery with very good quality products, a couple of cafeterias and a small playground

title: (36939) Bueu - 71 Lugar O Valado
description: We went in the middle of the Sonrias 2023 festival and since there was almost no space, we ended up in the soccer field parking lot. Quiet to spend the night but 20 min walk from the port

title: (36930) Bueu - 27 Rúa de Montero Ríos
description: Ample parking to visit the port area of Bueu. Without any service but close to stop in town.

title: (36915) Marín - 82 Avenida de Ourense
description: Large car park, for groceries, laundromat and downtown stores. flat possibilities to spend the night.

title: (36949) Cangas - Rúa do Balcón do Rei
title_short: (36949) Cangas - Rúa do Balcón do Rei
description:
Area with many tables with lots of shade. Ample parking to stop to eat or rest. A little abandoned, but acceptable. There are barbecues. The access is complicated because the Maps tries to get you through forest roads, there is a paved track with some slope and 2 signs but they are erased.
Edit: The best thing is to go up where it is indicated towards a school, the access is right in front.

title: (36315) Vigo - 25 Estrada do Freixo
description: Very quiet esplanade both day and night, great views of the city and the Vigo estuary, several areas to spend the night without problem, safe place.

title: (36212) Vigo - 24 Avenida Samil
description: Spacious area with lots of trees to keep the car cool during the day. Beach access right in front of the parking lot. Somewhat noisy as a road runs along the coast.

title: (36143) Pontevedra - 39 Aldea Cabanas
description: Washing of motorhomes, campers and vans, there is a cafeteria if you want to have a coffee.

title: () Marín - Unnamed Road
description: Parking next to the harbor with large squares

title: (36939) Bueu - 75 Rúa de Montero Ríos
description: Hello, we have spent two nights in a street that is not a parking lot but it is super good with views of the beach, it has a portable battery on the beach itself and a shower with drinking water, we have changed the waters in the beach bar, the town It has a great promenade where you can walk with parks for children, a beautiful fishing village, with supermarkets, I would repeat since we have not had any problems, the beach in the mornings was empty

title: (36915) Marin - 148 Poblado Monte
description: Tight parking slots (campervan only) with view over Portocelo beach. There is a restaurant right next to it, very few cars passing by at night.

title: (36911) Marín - Via Ciclista
description: Quiet place at the edge of the water. Motorhome of more than 6 m difficult but achievable access

title: (36212) Vigo - 10C Rúa Robaleira
description: Asphalted esplanade, free and without any type of signage and limitation. Ideal to go to the beach that is about 400m. Fairly busy for the day. Ground with some inclination. Without any kind of service.

title: (36949) Cangas - 32 Rúa da Congorza
description: Away from any house, with views of the gulf and a small beach next door. Quiet at night, in the morning a couple of cars and people walking but without any problem. No services.

title: (36939) Bueu - 91C Rua de Ramon Bares
description:
Best drinking water you will ever find
very good quality drinking water

title: (36212) Vigo - 24 Avenida Samil
description: Ideal area to park air conditioning or motorhome. Playa de Samil next to the bus stop and bars in the area. Parking prohibited from June to September)

title: (36937) Bueu - 84 Rúa de Pazos Fontenla
description: Public car park next to the Bueu skatepark, 100 m from the port and all shops, bars, restaurants. Public toilets opposite. No shims needed. Spent the night, no ban reported.

title: (36212) Vigo - 9-11 Rúa Argazada
description: Residential street in Samil beach, ideal for overnight.Parking is allowed.Very quiet.

title: (36208) Vigo - 4 Rúa Argazada
description: Small free parking. Ideal to go to the beach that is about 300 meters. Quite busy for the day. 10 seats. Floor without inclination. Without any kind of service.

title: (36212) Vigo - 3 Rúa Dunas de Samil
description: A busy place lasts the day but quiet at night, beach very close with bars and walks, for children a children's park and also a free public swimming pool, we could not enjoy it because of the CobiT but it is on the beach, very comfortable and happy we were in the zone.

title: (36949) Cangas - 33 Baixada a Areamilla
description: Battery car parks on the seafront. Small beach with crystal clear waters with a beach bar right in front. Very quiet, at least in September. To access I recommend coming from Cangas city, on the slope you will take the first crossroads to the left that Googlemaps indicates, you will come to a crossroads (left), just before reaching a beach that you will see shortly after (right), you will have come straight to your destination (areamilla beach).

title: (36949) Cangas - 120 Rúa Balea
description: Very quiet area to spend the night by the sea, surrounded by small coves. We arrived at sunset and there was no one, the views of the estuary are beautiful. Some cars park during the day, but nothing annoying. Quiet place a few meters from a cove full shells, ideal.

title: (36937) Bueu - 155 Rúa de Montero Ríos
description: We stopped by chance, great to go with children, park next door and beach next door. The town is super trankilo. The police very nice told us that in principle there are no problems if we do not park more than 24 hours

title: (36937) Bueu - 83 Rúa de Alexandre Bóvêda
description: A small field that we have found to park and spend the night for free with plenty of space.

title: (36310) Vigo - 13 Camiño da Arrouba
description: Shaded flat parking, ideal for doing the zamans mill route, very quiet, we do not bother anyone ???

title: (36949) Cangas - 2 Rúa Pontillón
description: Good facilities for emptying grey water, chemical waste and filling up with water.

title: (36860) Ponteareas - 1 Rúa Doctor Fernández Vega
description: Nice large laundry room with parking in front. There are 2 Washers and 4 Dryers. Nearby there are Bars for waiting.

title: (36310) Vigo - 46 Estrada da Igrexa
description: Small siding next to the road and the river, where the Zamans Mills Route starts.

title: (36310) Vigo - 234 Estrada da Igrexa
description: Parking area in Parque Forestal de Zamans, 10 minutes from Vigo.Bar and Restaurant of the Association of Zamans in the same parking. Water and soon emptied.

title: (36939) Bueu - Avenida Castiñeiras
description: Gated private estate there is no height limit

name: Camping Playa Samil
title: (36212) Camping Playa Samil
description: Private campsite right in front of Samil Beach, very well located and quiet. We stayed two days, and enjoyed everything. The services are super good, and the staff too. Right in front of the beach and with a Dia supermarket next door

title: (36945) Cangas - 68 Rúa do Seixo
description: Next to a little traveled road with room for three to four large motorhomes. routes and mountain views is next to the varalonga trail and 5 minutes by car from the beach of limens

title: (36315) - 1D Camiño e 14 Valadares
description: Cepudo forest park. parking area with tables, barbecues, drinking water, children's play area. lovely views of the city. Short and long-distance hiking trails pass through here. Bar restaurant next door.

title: (36820) Puentecaldelas - 11 PO-255
description: Laundry in town. Washing machines and drying machines.

title: (36867) - 12 Lugar Searas

Car park isolated from the village, surrounded by nature, with a water point.
allows you to visit the petroglyph area (respect the stones, thank you!) or spend a quiet night.
no shade, good internet connection

title: (36937) Beluso - 37 Estrada Playa Beluso
description: Parking in the villages of Beloso. Supermarkets, pharmacy and bars very close. Beaches nearby. One behind the breakwater. Near Pontevedra.

title: (36418) O Porriño - Unnamed Road
description: Atios forest park, has enough tables to eat, a large fireplace for grill and parking area. It has water. We spent half a day there and a very quiet place. We would repeat without a doubt, highly recommended.

title: (36331) Vigo - 27 Rúa de Canido
description: Between Samil and Canido beach there are several car parks by the sea. We have spent more than one night without problems. It does not have any services and you are next to a road but the views are worth it.

name: Camping Aldán
title: (36945) Camping Aldán
description: Camping Aldan. They admit AC with emptying and filling area included in the price. There are pitches with shade and sun and they are grass. The entrances inside the campsite are somewhat narrow for AC but accessible. Admissions are from 3:00 p.m. and departures before 12:00 p.m. It has a common laundry area, toilets, showers and sinks. There is a bar (not open all day) and a playground. Beach 7min walk and supermarket 10 min. CARDS NOT ALLOWED !!!

title: (36945) San Cibrán - 104 Lugar San Cibran
description: Parking next to a park overlooking the beach. nice walk. we had a very quiet night.

title: (36945) Cangas - Rúa da Pinela
description: A good place to spend the night or spend a few days. No showers or sources where either empty cisterns, but it is a quiet and safe place.

title: (36003) Pontevedra - 114 Rúa Rosalía de Castro
description:
Area marked as parking for a maximum of 24 hours with an area for emptying gray water and the possibility of filling with water if you bring the appropriate threaded connection, there is a tap
very wide and uncrowded area near the river

title: (36004) Pontevedra - 888 Avenida Juan Carlos I
description: Parking place close to the city center, just 10 minutes walk. Not good for big size Caravans. It is quite and It is close to bars, restaurants and supermarkets.

title: (36820) Pontevedra - s/n Lugar Caldelas
description: Area in the shaded area with restricted access only for campers, next to Ponte Candelas and on the Blue Flag river beach.

title: (36945) Vilariño - 49 Rúa Estrada de Bueu
description: Laundry at the foot of the road, no loss. There are small washing machines and dryer. Very economical.

title: (36945) Cangas - 60 Camino Limens
description: Beautiful location with views of the ocean in front and the forest in the back. Some parked motorhomes...nice and quiet. Next to this place you have a viewpoint and it is forbidden to park alone in this place. All good with neighboring places like this.

title: (36937) O Cabalo - 81 Lugar O Cabalo
description: Public parking next to the football field. 5 minutes from Tulla beach. The site is quiet and illuminated. If there is a game or training, it is empty at 10:30 p.m. Place only to sleep if you have been late on the beach or you are going to embark to the Ons islands.

title: (36937) Bueu - 95T Rua Bon de Abaixo
description: Small paradise facing the sea, isolated, with a small beach 200m. We did not see anyone for 2 days!

title: (36163) Poio - 83 Lugar Lourido
description: Parking to go to the beach of Lourido (near Pontevedra). It is a car park but you can park on the length. Beautiful little beach. Wc and shower on the beach which is 50m. Cafeteria right next to the parking. One plant is opposite the other bank but does not change the translucent water.

title: (36945) Menduiña - 72 Rúa Baixada á Praia de Menduíña

title: (36002) Pontevedra - 39 Rua Jose Malvar Figueroa
description: "Portosin" self-service laundry. 3 washing machines, 3 dryers 17kg. Clean and pleasant. Very close to air conditioning, you can walk.

title: (36937) Bueu - 176 Lugar Montemogos
description: Parking with 4 spaces right in front of the Area de Bon beach, next to a picnic area. It is not quite level but to spend a night it is worth it. Next, 50 m. before, there is a large parking area but with more unevenness. In the parking lot that is 2 km. Further north there are signs prohibiting overnight stays. We have not seen any here, so it is important to take care of and keep the site clean, being discreet.

title: (36002) Pontevedra - 4 Rúa Padre Fernando Olmedo
description: Laundry, washing and drying.

title: (36316) Gondomar - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area with drinking water. peaceful place. There is a lot of parking (land) and it is quite flat for the night. On open days the views can be enjoyed beautiful views. There is a mountain refuge next to it.

title: (36937) Bueu - Unnamed Road
description: Private parking on Tulla beach. good condition Narrow road access. Beach allows dogs. 2 beach bars to snack and drink. The beach is worth it.

title: (36418) A Arrotea - Unnamed Road
description: Faro Budiño, parking / picnic area that gives access to the climbing school of the same name. Quiet and green place. On weekends something more noisy. Very steep access road in the first section, then smooths out.

title: (36002) Pontevedra - Avenida de Buenos Aires
description: New area of Pontevedra with filling and emptying service and 20 reserved places for a maximum of 72 hours a month. Caravans are also allowed. Wash up express laundry 100 meters away. The entrance is a bit complex because at the entrance of the street there is a sign of prohibited circulation

title: (36945) Cangas - 1 EP-1007
description: 8 parking spaces in front of the local kindergarten. Shaded seating. Small (drinking) water fountain available. Slight slope (3°). Right on the street. Spent a quiet night there.

title: (36163) Poio - 15 Rua Colon
description: Public parking place with about 25 spaces near the center 10 minutes walk

title: (36002) Pontevedra - 32 Avenida de Buenos Aires
description: Parking without slope next to the ac area for in case it is full, very quiet area to spend the night and close to the historic center of Pontevedra

title: (36002) Pontevedra - 2 Rúa García Escudero
description: Small launderette.

description: Poio municipal parking, very quiet, we spent the day and night quite a few times

title: (36002) Pontevedra - 32 Avenida de Buenos Aires
description: Spectacular place to sleep right in a cove although you have to wait at the last minute of the day to arrive and make sure there is parking, a real luxury

title: (36940) O Hío - s/n Lugar Iglesario
description: Cruceiro de Hio, the most beautiful in all of Galicia. This dirt parking lot is wide, in order to visit the monument, there is no restriction on sleeping.

title: (36966) Sanxenxo - 55 Lugar Granxa
description: Small parking on the beach in front of the shellfish packing plant. Ability to indent at the edge of the water. Very quiet night, we were alone in the parking lot. The beach is small but nice. Do not enter the address in the GPS because the address indicated is wrong. go directly through the GPS site

description: Near the official free parking space of the city of Pontevedra. New parking lot without installations. Dark and calm. On the edge of a large meadow for dog run. Within walking distance to the old town. Attention access above the pitch in the direction of the signposted parking lot.

title: (36002) Pontevedra - 64 Avenida de Bos Aires
description: The motorhome area being saturated, we spent the night parked at the side of the road with a view of the cable-stayed bridge. No particular during the night.
